Query: `BBCNEWS.201701:bbcnews` brazil's government is defending its plan to build dozens of huge hydro-electric dams
rowid: brazil's government is defending its plan to build dozens of huge hydro-electric dams. it argues the project will boost the economy and provide clean energy. environmentalists say the plan is a disaster for the amazon and will actually result in more deforestation and global warming.
